name: Wintershall Dea GmbH
bossPosition: Chairman of the Board of Directors
membership: Wintershall Dea is, among others, member of IOGP, Eurogas, BDEW and EEF.
goal:
Wintershall Dea stands for more than 120 years of experience as an operator and project partner along the entire E&P value chain. The company employs around 4,000 people worldwide from over 60 nations.
The company with German roots and headquarters in Kassel and Hamburg explores for and produces gas and oil in 13 countries worldwide in an efficient and responsible manner. With activities in Europe, Russia, Latin America and the MENA region (Middle East & North Africa), Wintershall Dea has a global upstream portfolio and, with its participation in natural gas transport, is also active in the midstream business.
interests: Banking and financial services, Business and Industry, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Foreign affairs and security policy, Institutional affairs, Single market, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: EU Energy Union, European Energy Security Strategy, European Energy Policy, European Environmental Policy, European Climate Policy, Gas Market Regulation, External Relations regarding energy related topics, Sustainable Finance
